title: Crayola Brush Pens Painting Supplies, Art Supplies, Paint Set, 5 Count
description: From the Crayola Project line, Paint Brush Poster Pens offer a terrific less-mess alternative to traditional painting, since the washable kids' paints are contained inside the pens. Great to have on hand for arts and crafts projects, plus homework assignments, school projects, and more. Crayola Washable Paints wash clean from skin, most washable clothing and walls. This paint set includes 5 Paintbrush Pens in Red, Yellow, Green, Blue, and Purple. Ideal for kids ages 6 & up.
